Summary: Large silver bullet shaped craft flying SW to NE low across sky
divs: Sighting DetailsI was sitting on my patio with my wife and her sister. When I first noticed a large bullet shaped object flying from the SW about 1 mile up.I then told my wife and her sister to look up and see it. The object then continued to fly over to where we were and over the house. We heard no sound.The object Did Not have any wings,and any windows that were visable or lights.It was not a blimp or any other aircraft I have ever seen.It continued flying in a straight path toward the NE until out of our sight which lasted about 1 minute.
trends: There has been one other sighting in Johnstown
There were no other sightings in Johnstown on or around June 22nd 2009
